Living in Durham

Durham Apartments for Rent

Durham has an average Walk Score of 30 with 228,330 residents.

Durham has some public transportation and does not have many bike lanes.

The most walkable Durham neighborhoods are Old West Durham, Duke University - East Campus and Walltown.

Nearby Durham Apartments on Redfin

View Durham apartments for rent  |  View Durham homes for sale

Durham is a Car-Dependent city

Most errands require a car.

Eating & Drinking

There are about 778 restaurants, bars and coffee shops in Durham.

People in Durham can walk to an average of 0.9 restaurants, bars and coffee shops in 5 minutes.
